headline: Assessing General Motors (GM) Valuation After A Strong Year Of Shareholder Returns
summary: Why General Motors stock is on investors’ radar now General Motors (GM) has drawn fresh attention after a strong 1 year total return of 75.6%, which is prompting investors to reassess what the current share price of $83.30 might be implying about future expectations. See our latest analysis for General Motors. Recent trading has cooled slightly, with a 1 day share price return of a 3.47% decline and a 7 day share price return of a 3.43% decline.
